data.name: EARTHLOCK - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
[h1]The Original Soundtrack for Earthlock: Festival of Magic. [/h1]

music Composed By Eiko Nichols

Additional Music By Hiroki Kikuta & Frits Olsen


Tracks (34):
  • Echoes of the Earth (01:56)
  • Hiroki Kikuta - Halls of Karba (03:39)
  • Smashing Waves (02:05)
  • Whispering Seedlings (04:30)
  • Nautical Swamps (02:11)
  • Vast Canyons (05:38)
  • Deep into the Shadows (03:27)
  • Dreamless Grotto (02:03)
  • Whimsical Movements (02:11)
  • Frits Olsen - Maato's Will (02:19)
  • Scavenger's Market (01:43)
  • Bleak Wintertide (05:34)
  • Ichabo's Narcissism (02:32)
  • Pulsating Sands (01:59)
  • Golden Noir (02:39)
  • Seat of Power (02:06)
  • Murky Waters (03:50)
  • Dance of the Scholars (02:24)
  • Bryn's Awakening (02:08)
  • March of the Tides (02:05)
  • Scavenger's Tears (02:03)
  • Hero's Journey (05:36)
  • Eerie Cottage (02:10)
  • Frantic Hollow (02:03)
  • Frits Olsen - Maato’s Mind (02:19)
  • Bubbling Marshes (02:38)
  • City of Lights (02:16)
  • Barren Lands (05:39)
  • Sweltering Desert (01:59)
  • Ichabo's Ascension (02:31)
  • The Spirit of Amon (02:09)
  • Echoing Caverns (03:28)
  • Shimmery Glaciers (02:16)
  • Key to the Earth (01:22)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: x86 Dual Core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 GPU with 1GB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: x86 Quad Core 3.4GHz or greater
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 GPU with 2GB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or newer
  • Processor: x86 Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ GPU with 1GB of memory
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or newer
  • Processor: x86 Dual Core 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ GPU with 2GB of memory
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
